tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage

definition.text: Now that we have implemented statements involving the 1H chart, we need to revise our testing parameters!

paragraphs.text: Make the following changes in these parameters:
Time Range: change the initialDateTime to 2020-02-01, so that we avoid the errors during the first 19 days of January.
Time Frame: change the label to 01-hs to adapt to the current definitions.
We are not addressing the rest of the parameters yet, as we haven't defined the Open Stage, the one dealing with execution.
